div.p: Enrichment materials will be available for students on April 29th from 11:00 AM - 5:30 PM at Chase County Schools. Students in grades 7-12 may also pick up their items from their lockers and may return iPads or Chromebooks if they are not in use. Chase County staff have already emptied lockers and labeled bags for students so one member of the family will still be able to pick up all household material. The exception . . .

div.p:

div.p:
​​​
WHERE TO FROM HERE? by Larry A Lambert, Chase County Schools Interim Superintendent
This past week Governor Ricketts declared that all schools in Nebraska are to operate without students in the building through May 31, 2020, and then almost simultaneously Nebraska School Activities Association (NSAA) cancelled all . . .

PDF of Enrichment Information
CCS Enrichment Information
The Chase County School building will be closed through May 1st. During this time of school closure the teaching staff will be providing enrichment materials for students. These activities are not required to be completed or returned to the teacher but rather to provide the opportunity for students to continue to be engaged in their educational . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Chase County School Enrichment Information

www.ixl.com/signin/chasecounty

div.p:
PDF of School Closure Meal Information
Children Eat Free!
Chase County Schools has worked with the Nebraska Department of Education to secure grant funding in order that we may provide free breakfast and lunch to children ages 1-18. This program is designed to feed all children.
Meals will be “Grab & Go” and can be picked up at the following locations and . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Update: Children Eat Free!

h3.a: Meals For Children During School Closure

div.p:
Meals for Students During School Closure
Chase County Schools is working with the Nebraska Department of Education to provide possible grant funding in order that we may provide breakfast and lunch free of charge to children ages 1-18 during the school closure. Details regarding locations and times will be released at a later time. One of the requirements for planning is to get a household count. . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Meals For Children During School Closure
